## useLocalStorage() function

Use local storage value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useLocalStorage<T>(key: string, options?: UseLocalStorageOptions<T>): UseLocalStorageResult<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Key of local storage item. |
|  options | [UseLocalStorageOptions](./hooks.uselocalstorageoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Options to interact with local storage. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UseLocalStorageResult](./hooks.uselocalstorageresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

Value of local storage item, and a function to update it.
